karma.karmastats.good_knockout.desc: 友好生物（例如村民，玩家）死亡的數量。
karma.karmastats.bad_knockout.desc: 敵對生物（例如殭屍，敵人）死亡的數量。
karma.karmastats.saves.desc: 即將殺死另一個實體的被殺/被擊倒實體死亡的數量（例如，殭屍狩獵村民）。
karma.karmastats.thefts.desc: 搶劫村民數量（右擊一個被淘汰的村民給你他的交易）。
karma.karmastats.modified.desc: 只有管理員可以使用/ karma變更的統計訊息。
lucraftcore.abilities.grab.name: 抓斗
lucraftcore.abilities.sweep_kick.name: 掃堂腿

lucraftcore.info.infinity_gauntlet_cast_: 你可以在村莊的鐵匠房裡的儲物箱找到這個。
lucraftcore.bed.too_small: You are too small to sleep in bed!
lucraftcore.bed.too_big: You are too big to sleep in bed!
karma.karmastats.ambientKills.desc: Amount of killed innocent mobs (e.g. villagers).
karma.karmastats.goodHostileKills.desc: Amount of killed bad mobs (e.g. zombies) which were killed with a good intention. You increase this stat when you are a vigilante or better.
karma.karmastats.badHostileKills.desc: Amount of killed bad mobs (e.g. zombies) which were killed with a bad intention. You increase this stat when you are a thug or worse.
karma.karmastats.ambientKnockOuts.desc: Amount of knocked out innocent mobs (e.g. villagers).
karma.karmastats.hostileKnockOuts.desc: Amount of knocked out bad mobs (e.g. zombies).
